A tale of three customer service chatbots (permalink) AI can't do your job, but an AI salesman can convince your boss to fire you and replace you with an AI that can't do your job. Nowhere is that more true than in customer service: https://pluralistic.net/2025/08/06/unmerchantable-substitute-goods/#customer-disservice Customer service is a pure cost center for companies, and the best way to reduce customer service costs is to make customer service so terrible that people simply give up.
